thread.title: “Sexist Nonsense!” Sonam Kapoor Hits Back At The Ridiculous Comments About Her Recent Outfit
thread.title_full: “Sexist Nonsense!” Sonam Kapoor Hits Back At The Ridiculous Comments About Her Recent Outfit

author: Rashmi Daryanani
title: “Sexist Nonsense!” Sonam Kapoor Hits Back At The Ridiculous Comments About Her Recent Outfit
text:
Rashmi Daryanani Mar . 4 . 2017 Sonam Kapoor 
Another day, another reason to be annoyed as a woman in this country. Sonam Kapoor attended an event looking pretty damn fierce recently, but headlines the next day suggested that she was “uncomfortable” and “awkward” with her outfit – just because it showed some skin. 
She hit back at some of these publications, calling the situation “sexist nonsense”: 
It’s incredibly frustrating to see women being policed for their clothing even now, but we’re glad more and more people are lashing back. More power to Sonam, and all the women out there who deal with this nonsense on a daily basis. 0
